snippet: Quarterback Colin Kaepernick has opted out of his contract with the San Francisco 49ers, the National Football League team said on Friday....

headline.main: 'Bama Star Linebacker Foster Sent Home From NFL Combine
headline.print_headline: 'Bama Star Linebacker Foster Sent Home From NFL Combine

lead_paragraph: Quarterback Colin Kaepernick has opted out of his contract with the San Francisco 49ers, the National Football League team said on Friday.
